attributes.subject: Mathematics
questions: What is the determinant of a 2x2 matrix [[a,b],[c,d]]?
What does it mean for vectors to be linearly independent?
answers: A scalar λ such that Av = λv for some non-zero vector v
Multiply rows of first matrix by columns of second matrix
A matrix is invertible if its determinant is non-zero
No vector can be written as a linear combination of the others
